title: Effekttariffer är på väg - så kan du som elanvändare förbereda dig
description: Från och med 1 januari 2027 kommer alla elnätsbolag i Sverige att införa effekttariffer - en ny form av prissättning som förändrar hur du betalar för elnätet. Det handlar inte längre bara om hur mycket el du använder, utan också när och hur snabbt du använder den.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: I Built a Full AI-Ready Design System in 1.4 Days. With AI.
description:
I Built a Full AI-Ready Design System in 1.4 Days. With AI.
And why this matters far more than you think for the future of energy.
author: Paul Cooper

title: Electricity prices change all the time. But your life doesn’t have to.
description: Does the world really need another app that shows the electricity price? Probably not. But an app that turns that price into clear insights and real savings - that’s what Sourceful Energy does best.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: How Stockholm Homeowners Are Saving €267 a Year on Peak Demand Fees
description: The Problem: Peak Demand Fees (And Why They're Hitting Your Wallet). Most people think their electricity bill is just about how much power they use, but there's actually two separate charges on your bill.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: Sourceful Energy and Kalmar Energi Collaborate for Smarter Energy Usage
description: Sourceful Energy is entering into a partnership with Kalmar Energi to give household customers access to real-time data about their electricity consumption.
author: Fredrik Ahlgren

title: Sourceful App 1.9.0: Real-Time Spot Prices to Help You Make Smarter Energy Choices
description: We're thrilled to announce the release of Sourceful App version 1.9.0, bringing you powerful new features designed to make your energy management experience more seamless, accessible, and insightful than ever before.
author: Johan Leitet

title: The Complete Handbook to Vehicle-to-Everything for Private Owners
description: What does V2X actually mean? You've probably heard terms like V2X, V2G, V2H, and V2L - but what do they stand for and why does it matter? Here's a quick guide.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: How Does V2X Affect Your EV Battery? The Complete Guide to Battery Health with Bidirectional Charging
description: The truth about Vehicle-to-Everything technology and what it means for your electric car's battery life
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: The Day Everything Changes
description: Today we're not just presenting products. We're launching the future of how every home will manage energy.
author: Fredrik Ahlgren

title: Sourceful EMS - Sync Your Energy Devices and Save Money
description: Sourceful syncs your meter, solar, battery and EV into one money-saving smart system. All in a single app.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: April 2025 Market Update: Frequency Control Reserve (FCR) Prices in Sweden
description: A quick overview of what happened in April 2025 on the FCR markets in Sweden
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: Installatör, energibolag eller marknads­optimerare?
description: Sourceful Energy öppnar sin EMS‑plattform för solceller, batterier och elbilar. Transparens, interoperabilitet och innovation - bygg vidare på vår öppna gateway.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: Seamless Authentication: Log into Your Energy Dashboard Without the Hassle
description: Seamless Authentication: Log into Your Energy Dashboard Without the Hassle
author: Sourceful Team

title: A Wake-Up Call for Europe’s Energy Future
description: Today’s blackout across Spain and Portugal is a stark reminder of the vulnerabilities inherent in our centralized energy infrastructure. When a single point fails, the ripple effects can be catastrophic, disrupting lives, economies, and essential services.
author: Fredrik Ahlgren

title: Swedish Grid Services Market: March 2025 Seasonal Trends Explained
description: Svenska kraftnät’s March 2025 report shows a seasonal rise in FCR balancing service prices - discover what drives the cost and how grid stability is safeguarded.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: App Version 1.5.0 Release Notes
description: We’ve just launched version 1.5.0 of the Sourceful Energy app - and while many of the biggest changes are under the hood, this release sets the stage for some exciting features on the horizon.
author: Johan Leitet

title: Europe’s Energy Future Starts on the Rooftop
description: Smart buildings could deliver over 50% of the EU's daily flexibility needs by 2030, saving billions in grid investments. SolarPower Europe's report highlights how interoperability can unlock this potential today
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: Evolving Together: Refining the Sourceful Energy Points System
description: Building a truly effective network of Distributed Energy Resources (DERs) is a journey, not a destination. At Sourceful Energy, a core part of that journey involves continuously refining how we recognize and reward the contributions that strengthen our network.
author: Fredrik Ahlgren

title: Reflections from the Future of Utilities Energy Transition Summit 2025
description: Last week, I had the opportunity to attend the Future of Utilities Energy Transition Summit in Amsterdam - my first time at the event, and certainly not the last.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: The €4 Billion Secret: How Electric Vehicles Are Becoming Grid Operators' Best Investment
description: A new report from EY and Eurelectric titled "Plugging into potential: unleashing the untapped flexibility of EVs" reveals how electric vehicles can help stabilize energy grids while saving money for both consumers and grid operators.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: AI Energy Price Optimisation
description: Revolutionary AI Energy Optimisation System for Battery Owners. Sourceful Energy Unveils Game-Changing Smart Battery Management Technology to Maximize Energy Savings and Grid Participation.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: Record Low Prices for Frequency Regulation Services in Sweden
description: Sweden's FCR Market: Record-Breaking Low Prices for Grid Stability Services in February 2025. Key Electricity Market Trends Show Frequency Regulation Reserves Reaching Unprecedented Price Levels
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: Grid Balance: The Foundation of Energy Transformation
description: At the heart of our modern energy infrastructure lies a delicate equilibrium that most citizens never consciously perceive. The electrical grid-among humanity's most complex engineered systems-operates on a principle of perfect balance between supply and demand.
author: Fredrik Ahlgren

title: Revolutionizing Energy with the new Sourceful Energy App for iOS and Android
description: The innovative Sourceful Energy app empowers you to seamlessly connect your solar panels, energy meter and batteries to our decentralized energy network, enabling you to monitor your energy production, and contribute to a sustainable future.
author: Sourceful Team

title: The Great Energy Transformation: Why Timing is Everything
description: The recent price spike in the Nordic electricity market, where Danish prices surged to 936 EUR/MWh, isn't just another market anomaly - it's a clear signal of the fundamental transformation occurring in our energy systems.
author: Fredrik Ahlgren

title: Sourceful Energy: Building the Foundation for Tomorrow's Energy Data Ecosystem
description: Sourceful Energy provides the first real-time, triple-validated data solution for DERs through our secure Energy Gateway, third-party APIs, and utility meter integration.
author: Fredrik Ahlgren

title: Security Concerns Over Foreign Inverters Highlight Need for Local DER Control
description: Lithuania has announced plans to block certain foreign-made solar inverters through new cybersecurity legislation. This decision underscores the critical importance of maintaining control and ownership of your solar and battery systems.
author: Viktor Olofsson

title: Sourceful Energy Expands Network Access with P1 Meter Integration
description: Sourceful Energy Expands Network Access with P1 Meter Integration: Unlock Energy Insights and Rewards Without Solar or Battery Installations.
author: Sourceful Team

title: The Solar Revolution is Here, and Sourceful Energy is Enabling Its Decentralized Future
description: Solar energy is growing exponentially, with projections showing it could surpass all other power sources by 2040. This rapid growth is driven by plummeting costs and economies of scale. However, challenges such as grid integration and storage need to be addressed.
author: Fredrik Ahlgren

title: Powering the Future: The Key to Energy Abundance Lies in Connectivity
description: We're witnessing the birth of a new era in energy - one that's distributed, renewable, and full of promise. But with this promise comes a challenge: how do we integrate and manage this explosion of distributed energy resources (DERs)?
author: Fredrik Ahlgren
